name: Zoho Meeting
description: Video conferencing solution integrated with Zoho Workplace, affordable for SMBs

opengraph.title: Online Meeting Software & Platform - Zoho Meeting
opengraph.description: Zoho Meeting is an online meeting software that helps you host virtual meetings, web & video conferences for seamless remote collaboration. Rated as the best meeting platform for all video conferencing needs. Try it for free!
